categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Army (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Armageddon Battalion was a battalion of Imperial soldiers serving the reconstituted Sith Empire's Army. It fought in the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY. They fought in this battle under the command of Darth Vowrawn, but they were redeployed to Hoth by Darth Baras in the middle of the battle.
